## IIcon.onLocationChange() method

Notifies the icon that it has changed locations.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onLocationChange(blockOrigin: Coordinate): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  blockOrigin | [Coordinate](./blockly.utils.coordinate.md) | The location of this icon's block's top-start corner in workspace coordinates. |

**Returns:**

void
